overview: The Story of a Naughty Little Angel...with a bite. Tough Tony gets whacked, but some twerp won't let him into Heaven until he plays guardian angel...and teams him with Joe Doggs, who Tony's already wrapped in cement. Then Tony tries to save Sam, the Boss' gorgeous hacker, but the fox eats a slug and is whisked up into Celestial Accounting. And this is only the beginning.
title: Blue Angel
